## R is free

- Users have the freedom to run, copy, distribute, study, change and improve the software.
- Free as in "free speech" not "free beer"
- Part of the GNU project (along with Linux, Ginmp etc.)

##R is a calculator

##R objects

```{R,error = T}
x <- 4
x

rm(x)
x

```


##R objects

```{R}
x <- 4
x + 7

```



##R objects

```{R}
x <- 4
y <- 7
x + y

```





##Vectors

```{R}
x <- c(6,7,8)
x

x <- c(1:10)
x

```






##Vectors

```{R}
x <- c(1:10)
x + 1
x/2

y <- c(101:110)
x*y

```



##Vectors

```{R}
x <- c(1:10)
x + 1
x/2

y <- c(101:110)
x*y

```






##Vectors

```{R}
x <- c(1,2,4,4,4,5)

x[5]
x[c(4:6)]

```








##Functions

```{R}
x <- c(1,2,4,4,4,5,11)
sum(x)
length(x)
sum(x)/length(x)
mean(x)


```
